languages.text: Наконец исследователи спускаются в сухие, удивительно просторные пещеры. Минута беспечного спокойствия обрывается испуганным вскриком — отряд атакован! Своды туннеля рушатся, превращаясь в чудовищных монстров, похожих одновременно на червей и пауков. Твари нападают и жаждут разорвать тех, кто потревожил их покой!

traits.locale_text: Наконец исследователи спускаются в сухие, удивительно просторные пещеры. Минута беспечного спокойствия обрывается испуганным вскриком — отряд атакован! Своды туннеля рушатся, превращаясь в чудовищных монстров, похожих одновременно на червей и пауков. Твари нападают и жаждут разорвать тех, кто потревожил их покой!

languages.text: The explorers eventually reach the dry, surprisingly large caverns. A minute of respite is interrupted by a terrified scream — the squad is under attack! The tunnel's arches collapse, turning into nightmarish monsters resembling both worms and spiders. The beasts rush forward, yearning to tear apart the intruders who disturbed their rest!

Своды туннеля рушатся, превращаясь в чудовищных монстров, похожих одновременно на червей и пауков. Твари нападают и жаждут разорвать тех, кто потревожил их покой!

traits.locale_text: The explorers eventually reach the dry, surprisingly large caverns. A minute of respite is interrupted by a terrified scream — the squad is under attack! The tunnel's arches collapse, turning into nightmarish monsters resembling both worms and spiders. The beasts rush forward and yearn to tear apart the intruders who disturbed their rest!

The tunnel's arches collapse, turning into nightmarish monsters resembling both worms and spiders. The beasts rush forward, yearning to tear apart the intruders who disturbed their rest!

The explorers eventually reach the dry, surprisingly large caverns. A minute of respite is interrupted by a terrified scream — the squad is under attack! The tunnel's arches collapse, turning into nightmarish monsters resembling both worms and spiders. The beasts rush forward, yearning to tear apart the intruders who disturbed their rest!

languages.text: 探险者最终抵达了干燥的巨大洞穴，但片刻的喘息却被一声惊恐的尖叫打断！小队遭到了袭击！隧道的拱顶突然倒下，变成了一大群恐怖的怪物。这群看起来既像是蠕虫，又像是蜘蛛的怪物冲了过来，打算将这群打扰休息的探险队员统统撕碎！
languages.original_text: The explorers eventually reach the dry, surprisingly large caverns. A minute of respite is interrupted by a terrified scream — the squad is under attack! The tunnel's arches collapse, turning into nightmarish monsters resembling both worms and spiders. The beasts rush forward, yearning to tear apart the intruders who disturbed their rest!

traits.locale_text: 探险者最终抵达了干燥的巨大洞穴，但片刻的喘息却被一声惊恐的尖叫打断！小队遭到了袭击！隧道的拱顶突然倒下，变成了一大群恐怖的怪物。这群看起来既像是蠕虫，又像是蜘蛛的怪物冲了过来，打算将这群打扰休息的探险队员统统撕碎！

languages.text: 隊員たちは、やがて乾燥した、驚くほど巨大な洞窟にたどり着く。1分間の休息は、恐怖におののく悲鳴によって中断された。部隊が攻撃を受けたのだ！トンネルのアーチが崩れ、ミミズにもクモにも似た悪夢のような怪物が取った変わる。休息を邪魔する侵入者を引き裂こうと、獣たちが突進してくる！
languages.original_text: The explorers eventually reach the dry, surprisingly large caverns. A minute of respite is interrupted by a terrified scream — the squad is under attack! The tunnel's arches collapse, turning into nightmarish monsters resembling both worms and spiders. The beasts rush forward, yearning to tear apart the intruders who disturbed their rest!

traits.locale_text: 隊員たちは、やがて乾燥した、驚くほど巨大な洞窟にたどり着く。1分間の休息は、恐怖におののく悲鳴によって中断された。部隊が攻撃を受けたのだ！トンネルのアーチが崩れ、ミミズにもクモにも似た悪夢のような怪物が取った変わる。休息を邪魔する侵入者を引き裂こうと、獣たちが突進してくる！

languages.text: Los exploradores llegan finalmente a las cavernas, secas y sorprendentemente grandes. Un minuto de tregua se ve interrumpido por un grito aterrorizado: ¡el pelotón está siendo atacado! Los arcos del túnel se derrumban, convirtiéndose en monstruos aterradores parecidos a gusanos y arañas. Las bestias se abalanzan sobre ellos, deseosas de despedazar a los intrusos que han perturbado su descanso.
languages.original_text: The explorers eventually reach the dry, surprisingly large caverns. A minute of respite is interrupted by a terrified scream — the squad is under attack! The tunnel's arches collapse, turning into nightmarish monsters resembling both worms and spiders. The beasts rush forward, yearning to tear apart the intruders who disturbed their rest!

traits.locale_text: Los exploradores llegan finalmente a las cavernas, secas y sorprendentemente grandes. Un minuto de tregua se ve interrumpido por un grito aterrorizado: ¡el pelotón está siendo atacado! Los arcos del túnel se derrumban, convirtiéndose en monstruos aterradores parecidos a gusanos y arañas. Las bestias se abalanzan sobre ellos, deseosas de despedazar a los intrusos que han {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g} su descanso.

languages.text: Schließlich erreicht das Erkundungsteam die trockenen, überraschend großen Höhlen. Eine kurze Minute der Rast wird von einem entsetzten Schrei jäh beendet — das Team wird angegriffen! Die Decke des Tunnels bricht ein und verwandelt sich in albtraumhafte Monster, die an Würmer und Spinnen erinnern. Die Monster stürmen vor, um die Eindringlinge zu zerfetzen, die ihren Schlaf gestört haben!
languages.original_text: The explorers eventually reach the dry, surprisingly large caverns. A minute of respite is interrupted by a terrified scream — the squad is under attack! The tunnel's arches collapse, turning into nightmarish monsters resembling both worms and spiders. The beasts rush forward, yearning to tear apart the intruders who disturbed their rest!

traits.locale_text: Schließlich erreicht das Erkundungsteam die trockenen, überraschend großen Höhlen. Eine kurze Minute der Rast wird von einem entsetzten Schrei jäh beendet — das Team wird angegriffen! Die Decke des Tunnels bricht ein und verwandelt sich in albtraumhafte Monster, die an Würmer und Spinnen erinnern. Die Monster stürmen vor, um die Eindringlinge zu zerfetzen, die ihren Schlaf gestört haben!

languages.text: Les explorateurs finissent par atteindre de vastes cavernes sèches aux dimensions étonnantes. Ce bref instant de répit est aussitôt interrompu par un hurlement de terreur... L'équipe est attaquée ! Les arches du tunnel s'effondrent et se transforment en monstres cauchemardesques à mi-chemin entre le ver et l'araignée. Les créatures se précipitent pour dévorer les intrus qui ont osé troubler leur sommeil !
languages.original_text: The explorers eventually reach the dry, surprisingly large caverns. A minute of respite is interrupted by a terrified scream — the squad is under attack! The tunnel's arches collapse, turning into nightmarish monsters resembling both worms and spiders. The beasts rush forward, yearning to tear apart the intruders who disturbed their rest!

traits.locale_text: Les explorateurs finissent par atteindre de vastes cavernes sèches aux dimensions étonnantes. Ce bref instant de répit est aussitôt interrompu par un hurlement de terreur... L'équipe est attaquée ! Les arches du tunnel s'effondrent et se transforment en monstres cauchemardesques à mi-chemin entre le ver et l'araignée. Les créatures se précipitent pour dévorer les intrus qui ont osé troubler leur sommeil !

languages.text: Kâşifler nihayetinde kuru ve şaşırtıcı derecede geniş mağaralara ulaşıyor. Bir anlığına verdikleri mola korkunç bir çığlıkla yarıda kalıyor: Ekip saldırı altında! Tünelin kemerleri çöküp hem solucana hem de örümceğe benzeyen, kâbustan hâllice canavarlara dönüşüyor. Rahatlarını bozan işgalcileri paramparça etme arzusuna kapılan yaratıklar ileri atılıyor!
languages.original_text: The explorers eventually reach the dry, surprisingly large caverns. A minute of respite is interrupted by a terrified scream — the squad is under attack! The tunnel's arches collapse, turning into nightmarish monsters resembling both worms and spiders. The beasts rush forward, yearning to tear apart the intruders who disturbed their rest!
